name: JuggleShot
description:
By Diego D. and Christine L. 

Play as a clown trying to keep their circus business alive and fend off the evil cooperate goons using your amazing juggling talent. Instructions: Press space to shoot balls, and aim with your mouse. Use WASD to move. if you reach 1,000 score you win, and the game ends. if you get hit too many times, the game also ends. when the game ends restart the game.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
